Premier Core-Lokt Ultra Bonded is a bullet in a class of its own. Developed and designed by Remington’s industry-leading R&D staff, and manufactured to our exacting process standards, Core-Lokt Ultra Bonded offers hunters the unique combination of excellent accuracy, superb weight retention and expansion with overall superior terminal results. The bonded bullet retains up to 95% of its original weight with maximum penetration and energy transfer. Featuring a progressively tapered jacket design, the Core-Lokt Ultra Bonded bullet initiates and controls expansion nearly 2x. The unique design of the bullet combined with the bonded lead core provides the hunter with a Premier bullet that yields unmatched performance from 50 yards to 500 yards and all yardages in-between. Premier Core-Lokt Ultra Bonded — the new standard in high-performance hunting bullets.

title: For Sale:  Springfield Armory XDS 3.3" .45acp
location: Charlotte, 4724 Old Pineville Rd., Charlotte, North Carolina
postcontent:
I have a brand new Springfield Armory XDS 3.3" .45acp Bi-Tone for sale. This XDS comes with two 5 round magazines, hard carry case, hip holster, twin-mag hip holster, lock, cleaning brush, and all factory literature. 

Can a pistol small enough to carry every day have all the features, performance and power you would find in a full-size handgun? Can the ergonomics be so superior that range time is a pleasure rather than a chore? Could you actually look forward to shooting your carry pistol?

The XD-S® Single Stack  from Springfield Armory® has forever changed what you can expect out of your daily carry pistol. Now all the best features and power you’re used to in the XD® and XD(M)® lines can be had in the shockingly slim XD-S® Single Stack – a pistol that packs so easily you’ll forget it’s there.

The XD-S® is the first single-stack polymer framed pistol from Springfield Armory®. In addition to the inherently slim nature of the design, the frame is a short sub-compact style, and the barrel is just 3.3 inches. The XD-S® Single Stack seems to disappear when you carry it.

The strengths of the XD-S® 3.3″ Single Stack don’t stop there. Try it with an X-Tension™ magazine (7 rounds .45 ACP, 9 rounds 9mm), and you’ll find that your carry pistol has grown into something that will astonish and delight you on the range. Its comfortable ergonomics – complete with two interchangeable backstraps – allow it to work without punishing your hands. The fiber optic front sight and white-dot rear sight align quickly and provide a clear sight picture for accurate shooting. The XD-S® Single Stack also includes the Ultra Safety Assurance (USA) Action Trigger System™, grip safety, loaded chamber indicator, firing pin block, and grip safety that make the entire family of XD® pistols safe and easy to use.

Choosing a handgun for concealed carry doesn’t have to be a series of compromises anymore. You don’t have to settle for a larger gun to gain shooting comfort. Nor do you have to sacrifice features for power. And you certainly don’t have to carry a gun to the store that you’d rather not carry to the range. Put an XD-S® 3.3″ Single Stack in your hand today, and you’ll want to shoot it. Put it in your holster, and you’ll find that it’s Noticeably Unnoticeable™.

Come check this pistol out in person @ The Arms Room of Charlotte. Give me a call @ 980-237-eight9eight1 if you have any questions. Shipping can be arranged for $25. Check us out on Facebook @ www.facebook.com/thearmsroomcharlotte or try our website @ www.targuns.com Thanks for looking and have a good day.

title: For Sale:  M136 AT-4 AT4 Rocket Launcher (Fully Functional INERT)
postcontent:
Up for sale is a hard to find spent M136 AT-4 Rocket Launcher. This is INERT, and has no rocket, thus perfectly legal to sell, trade, and own. It's fully functional minus the rocket. 

The rear pop up sight has been broken off but the front pop up sight is intact. It is common standard practice to break the sites after firing the AT-4. With the sight doors closed it's not noticeable. Has the original sling, shoulder mount, and it also has all the rubber fins on the end of the tube (usually the fins are ripped out). The cocking mechanism, safety, and trigger all work fine. You can cock the AT-4, press down the safety, and fire.  See pictures for more details!

These are harder and harder to find collectibles, sold out everywhere online. Would make a great addition to any military collection, or man-cave.

Just in time for the holidays~

The debut of the full-size P-09 last year brought refined lines and interchangeable backstraps to our polymer Omega line. This year the compact-sized P-07 follows suit, with new features and a nitrated slide finish that wears longer and has increased corrosion resistance. title: For Sale:  Kahr CW380 NIB .380 2.58" CW3833 SS 6+1
postcontent:
NO Credit Card Fees like the Other Guys!! Read Their Fine Print!! This Listing is for One Factory Brand New in the Box Kahr P380 Semi-Auto Pistol in .380acp with one 6 rnd magazine. Factory Part # CW3833 Caliber: .380 ACP Capacity: 6+1 Operation: Trigger cocking DAO; lock breech; "Browning - type" recoil lug; passive striker block; no magazine disconnect Barrel: 2.58", Conventional Rifling, 1 - 16 right-hand twist Length O/A: 4.96" Height: 3.9" Slide Width: .75" Weight: Pistol 10.2 ounces (w/o magazine) Grips: Textured polymer Sights: Drift adjustable white bar-dot combat rear sight, pinned in polymer front sight Finish: Black polymer frame, matte stainless steel slide Magazine: 1 - 6 rd, Stainless The CW380 pistol has a 2.58 inch barrel, an overall length of 4.96 inches and a height of just 3.9 inches. It weighs just 10.2 ounces without a magazine. The pistol has a black polymer frame and features 4140 steel inserts molded into the front and back of the frame for added rigidity. It has a machined, solid 416 matte stainless steel slide and a textured polymer grip. The Kahr CW380 features a lock breech, modified Browning type recoil lug, and utilizes Kahr's seven patents including the "safe cam" action found in all Kahr pistols. The result is a micro-compact pistol with very little recoil and quick follow-up shots. The pistol features drift adjustable white bar-dot combat rear sight and pinned-in polymer front sight. Differences between the Kahr CW380 and Kahr P380 models include: the CW series has a conventional rifled barrel instead of the match grade polygonal barrel found on P models; the CW slide stop lever is MIM (metal-injection-molded) instead of machined; the CW series slide has fewer machining operations, and uses simple roll marking instead of engraved markings; the P380 comes with two magazines, but the CW series comes with one 6 rd steel magazine with flush baseplate. Lastly, the slide locks back after firing the last round – another feature missing on a number of other value-priced compact semi-auto pistols. The durability and reliability of the CW380 model makes it a strong consideration as a backup gun for law enforcement. 

We are selling this for $298.95 + 5.13% Sales Tax + Background Check for $324.29 OUT THE DOOR if you are picking up locally or $298.95 + $17 Shipping if you are outside of Colorado. Must be at least 21 Years Old and able to pass a Background Check to purchase.

title: For Sale:  Beretta 92
postcontent: Brand new, unfired Beretta 92/98 Billenium pistol in 9mm. This is a very rare and unique pistol of which less than 1000 were manufuctered worldwide by Beretta. Beretta created the 92/98 Billenium pistol with connoisseurs and expert marksman in mind. This gun is very different from standard Beretta 92/98 series pistols. For starters, the gun is made in Beretta's factory in Italy.The frame is manufactured from a special high resistance steel and a special satin/polished nickel alloy is used for the finish. The slide is slightly heavier than standard 92/98 pistols for better stability and less felt recoil. The slide has special machine cut patterns to aid in gripping the slide for chambering or clearing a round. The safety on this gun locks the slide/sear in closed position and is ambidextrous. The trigger on this gun is in a word, SUPERB! It is a Single Action Only trigger that was specially tuned by Beretta to be very light with no creep whatsoever. This competition trigger is micrometrically adjustable. The grips on this gun are carbon fiber for a high-tech look as well as strength and durability. The magazine release on this gun is extended and easily reversible for left handed shooters. The front and backstrap are fully checkered for excellent grip under all conditions. The sights are fully adjustable as well. Gun comes in original presentation case with all paperwork, two magazines, extra sights and cleaning kit.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Olympic Arms OA-93 Carbine
postcontent:
For sale is my pre-ban Olympic Arms OA-93 Carbine.  I am the second owner of this rifle.  If you are not familiar with this rifle's "unique" buffering system, check out this wiki page or google "OA93" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olympic_Arms_OA-93

The rifle is in good physical condition and has no mechanical issues.  I have fired roughly 500 rounds through it w/o issue.  It is not picky about ammo.  The rifle is missing a couple of the original pins and does not have the original side folding stock.  Nothing which has an impact on it's usability.  The rifle comes with 2 magazines, one 30 rounder and one 20 rounder.  It also comes with the original box and manual.

Pricing for this rifle is difficult as it's not high tech and decked out like most of the current tacti-cool rifles, but it is also a very unique item and would be considered by many a collectors item.  I believe that $675 is a fair price that lets it land somewhere in the middle of these two categories, but please feel free to make me a reasonable offer.  I am also open to the trades I have listed below in that section.

I am a MO CCW holder.

title: For Sale:  M16 Nickel Boron Complete Bolt Carrier Group BCG
postcontent:
I have one nickel boron coated cryptic BCG for sale. See specifications below.

Bolt carrier group (full auto version) for AR15, M16, or M4 machined from Mil-Spec 8620 aircraft quality steel with shrouded firing pin and Mil-Spec chrome lined interior. BCG includes the proper chrome lined and heat treated gas key. Gas key is secured to carrier with Grade 8 fasteners and properly staked per Mil-Specs. This insures a strong staking and proper gas system functioning. The bolt assembly is CNC machined from Mil-Spec Carpenter No. 158® steel and shot peened for increased strength per Mil-Spec; includes tool steel extractor with spring and viton O-ring; firing pin chromed finished with firing pin retaining pin and cam pin.

HPT (High Pressure Tested) and MPI (Magnetic Particle Inspected).

Complete Mil-Spec M-16 Bolt Carrier with Bolt Assembly HPT/MPI Tested:

Mil-Spec BCG Machined from 8620 Aircraft Quality Steel and heat treated to 60-61 RC
Mil-Spec Chrome Lined Carrier Interior
Mil- Spec Chrome Lined Gas Key
Key Staked with Grade 8 Screws, per Mil-Spec
Mil-Spec Carpenter 158® Bolt w/ Spring and Ejector 
Mil-Spec Extractor w/ Spring and viton O-ring
Mil-Spec Firing Pin w/ Chrome Finish
Mil-Spec Cam Pin

Nickel Boron (NiB) is a durable coating that provides reduced friction with excellent corrosion resistance. NiB impregnates the surface and becomes part of the metal. This process produces a surface harder than the metal itself. This characteristic provides overall wear properties superior to hard chromium. While NiB works as a lubricant additional dry film lubricate can be applied. The reduced friction reduces heat generated by metal-on-metal contact, so the gun runs cooler and parts last longer. Easy to clean, too—fouling brushes right off. This allowing for less time spent on cleaning and maintenance compared to the standard Mil-Spec coating.

title: For Sale:  1929 Hexagnol Mosin Nagant Phenominal Condition
postcontent:
Today im selling my Mosin. I really love this rifle, I just need to fund some other things currently. I bought this from Cabelas a few months ago, and I had it inspected by a qualified gun smith before firing it. after the gunsmith inspection, i took her out and put avout a hundred rounds through it.

My shoulder hurt. But she ran flawlessly, and was hitting consitantly in a very small grouping. I have completely removed all cosmoline from the weapon INCLUDING the entire bolt assembly. title: For Sale/Trade:  CZECH VZ24 MAUSER, Bolivian Contract -- GREAT CONDITION!!!!
location: Socastee, SC, South Carolina, United States
postcontent:
Before reading, I must be contacted before Thursday evening (31st July) as I will be traveling to South Carolina. I will only be there for a few days. Thanks!

I have an early model Czech VZ.24 Mauser. This gun is truly loaded with history (search google to find out). It is also revered by many (including Nazi soldiers of WWII, who used them in Stalingrad after capturing Czechoslovakian factories and also sent them to their Romanian allies) to be better than their own Mauser K98. As it was made in 1924, it is generally believed to have inspired the German design of the Karabiner 98k. These rifles appear to be moderately rare and few are around today as compared to the K98. To make it more rare, it is a Bolivian Contract rifle with Condor bird marking. Only 101,000 of these are around. This rifle has NO IMPORT MARKINGs, and as Bolivia has not released this gun for import, it is likely a vet bring-back. It also has numerous markings indicating that it was made by the Czechs and also accepted into their army (Z within a circle; "E" in front of a rampant lion) before being contracted out. I have been told my numerous experts that this gun features many components of a very early VZ24.
It is a great rifle in excellent condition, I am only trading this because I am seeking a rifle I can put on display (and shoot) in front of my U.S. WWII militaria collection. 

I am aware of the value of this rifle, as well as Mausers in general. I will politely respond (with rejection) to lowball offers, but please save us both the trouble. 

I do not wish to sell this wonderful rifle, but will only trade. I will add cash as needed, but can also throw in a revolver: http://www.armslist.com/posts/3323425/south-carolina-handguns-for-sale-trade---22-cowboy-style-revolver---hardcase---nice---

Thank you very much for looking!

P.S. Please ask for pics! The pics have high MB and Armslist cannot process it.

title: For Sale:  Beretta Px4 Storm Compact 40cal NIB
postcontent:
This is one sweet gun, great shooter, plenty of power (40cal) and just the right size to carry.
 I have only put 12 rounds down the tube, and it was accurate and flawless.
 But I have a new project and could use the cash.
 Its new in the original box.
 Beretta Px4 Storm Compact .40 S&W Pistol JXC4F21

 The Beretta Px4 Storm is a semiautomatic pistol designed for concealed carry and personal defense. Borrowing features from predecessors like the Beretta M9 and Beretta 92, it is rapidly proving itself as a suitable option for law enforcement (both on and off duty), private security forces, and responsible citizens. 

 The Px4 Storm comes in subcompact, compact, and full frame versions. Checkered grips on all models provide a sure grip in less than optimal conditions, and three backstraps (included with every pistol) can be swapped for comfort and fit. The design is based on that of the M9 and 92, and the Px4 Storm cannot be improperly assembled due to distinctive parts and one-way fit. 

 An ambidextrious safety (thumb operated decocking lever) prevents unintentional discharge in the event the gun is dropped. High capacity double stack steel magazines provide enough firepower for self defense and law enforcement. A non-glare coating on the slide resists corrosion and stands up to the abuse expected in the line of duty.

Chambered in 5.56x45mm NATO/223 Remington, the FN FS2000 Tactical is a civilian legal, semi-auto only variant of the proven F2000 selective-fire bullpup carbine that offers an integrated MIL-STD 1913 top mounting rail and factory 1x power optic. The FS2000 sports both a factory optic and a top-mounted M1913 rail for mounting optical, electronic or laser sighting systems (under the optic cover). An angled-face muzzle brake helps minimize recoil.
